title: Wings under test
creator_credit: S.T. Evans and Council for Scientific and Industrial Research (Australia). Information Service
brief_description: A summarized version is included in a later film entitled “Structural fatigue and air safety”. The method and equipment developed by the Division of Aeronautics to test large aircraft wings for airworthiness requirements, resistance to fatigue and ultimate static strength.
